name: dull
summary: a very low saturation colour scheme
description:
This is a very low saturation version based on default and torte colour scheme.  It looks only little different from syntax turned off, and is good for long-time works.

This colour scheme can work for both 'light' and 'black' backgrounds.  Use "set background=..." to switch the different styles.

Basically, it is designed for GUI, but it can fallback to a colourful mode in low-colour terminals.
install_details: Copy the dull.vim to $HOME/.vim/color/ directory (or %HOME%\vimfiles\color\ on MS-Windows)
